name: A Tale of Saviors: Garuda Academy
name_original: A Tale of Saviors: Garuda Academy
description:
Ten years after a mysterious gate appear over the world and monster appear in the human world called mystic beast. Their appearance is only bring chaos and destruction. After that, all countries agreed to establish an organization called SAVIORS which is gathering all of mystic power users all over the world and with this the mystic beast war begin.  With immeasureable sacrifices and they succeed end the war. Even so, the SAVIORS still preparing for the worst thing, which is the 10 years ago happened again. Therefore SAVIOR prepares young people who have talents who have the power of the Mystic Arms collected in one place, namely the academy developed by SAVIORS. One of them is Garuda Academy which is in the republic of Aethos.

Game Features:
1. Strategic Turn Based Battle System to overcome any challenges.
2. very level up bonus points you can distribute the character growth to your own liking.
3. Every skills have Cooldown. So you can’t just spam the strongest skill in the battle like usual to make battle more strategic.
4. No more random encounter battle.
5. Make your item through synthesis, to save your money and some of them is really useful. (In the future)
6. You can grind your level in VR-Stage in the academy, but you need to have the data disk to activate it, you can earn it by doing main quest, side quest, and maybe found it somewhere. (In the future)
7. You can buy a mystic crest (magic) for your journey to defeat enemies. (In the future)
